traits.name: A1 Reading problems
checklistItems: Improved word banks, glossaries and highlighted key items
Provided audio recordings and technological supports

Arranged for special provisions in assessment tasks, reader, extra time, seperate supervision

traits.name: A2 Low engagement
checklistItems: Displayed unit outlines, objectives and schedules in the classroom
Redesigned resources to be visually appealing and engaging

Considered preferential seating near teacher or peer role models

traits.name: A3 Problems with task completion

Colour-coded key terms and concepts
Explicitly taught note-taking and study skills
Broken tasks down into smaller, manageable steps
Included collaborative activities

Reduced literacy demands
